documentation.text: @dev Mapping individual tokens to their expiry dates.
@dev Emitted when a token is extended by redemption.

statements.documentation:
@dev    If the current time has passed the mapped expiry 
         time of token.

natspec.author: Daccred.
natspec.details: Controls time for minted tokens till expiry.

Extended(uint256,uint256).details: Emitted when a token is extended by redemption.

extendExpiry(uint256,uint256).details: On every successful redemption or mint of token the       expiry of the token is extended by the duration passed       in the contract.       This should be called on expired tokens.
extendExpiry(uint256,uint256).notice: This function is expected to be called by the           SoulboundRedeemable on every mint.

params.time: Length of time to extend it with.

getTimeLeft(uint256).details: Returns the time left for a token to expire.

isValid(uint256).details: Return true if the token is expired or false if otherwise.

tokenExpiryDate.details: Mapping individual tokens to their expiry dates.

natspec.title: IsValidWithDate contract.
